p: While we present evidence to discount the latter two as potential explanations of the differences in range movements across taxa reported here, we do not otherwise attempt to favour one or more explanation(s) over the others. Disentangling the underlying causes of the different range changes we observed will clearly be a challenge. Yet regardless of the underlying causes, the differences in range changes across taxa are clearly profound and highlight important spatial re-organization of plankton communities over recent decades.
